attributes.action: Reveal Jon Venables and Robert Thompson pictures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jon Venables and Robert Thompson brutally murdered a 2 year old boy and only serve eight years for murder and they both showed sadism as they tortured him. The two get released from prison and get rewarded with a new name and new identity and a new house all courtesy of the taxpayers. I think their pictures should be revealed just like all other murderers and rapists.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
